Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to authorizing media access to certain areas during publicly declared emergencies
Summary: Authorizes media members to have access to areas otherwise restricted to the public during public emergencies.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to allowing representatives of the media authorized access to areas closed during public emergencies
